descript.abstract: Statewide coverage of Wastewater Facility Regulation (WAFR) Facilities. This dataset includes facilities whose current operating status is Active, Closed but Monitored, or Under Construction. Also included are un-permitted facilities for which a permit is required. These facilities are regulated by the following Florida Department of Environmental Protection programs - "Industrial Wastewater Program", "Domestic Wastewater Program", "Phosphate Management Wastewater Program", "Power Plant Management Wastewater Program".

idinfo.useconst: This data is intended to be used for general informational and planning purposes, and is not appropiate for legal and/or cadastral purposes.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

overview.eaover:
ATTRIBUTE DESCRIPTION :
PK$WAFR_FACILITY Unique sequence identifier (key) for the facility record
FACILITY_ID Unique Facility ID
COUNTY Numeric code identifying the county which the facility operates in. For a complete list of the numeric codes, see the fields PK_COUNTY and NAME in the lookup table bis_lib.mt_county on FDEP 0 None 1-67 County names in alphabet order 99 All
OFFICE The DEP District or county office responsible for the facility For a complete list, see the lookup table bis_lib.offices on DEV/FDEP CD Central District NED Northeast District NWD Northwest District NWDP Northwest District Branch (Panama City) SD South District SDB South District Branch SED Southeast District SEDB Southeast District Branch SEPB Palm Beach County SWD Southwest District SWDS Desoto County SWHI Hillsborough County SWPM SWSA Sarasota County
FACILITY_TYPE AFO Animal Feeding Operation AGR Agricultural CBP Concrete Batch GP CFO Concentrated Animal Feeding Operation CON Conservation Area DEW Dewatering GP DW Domestic Wastewater Treatment Plant IU Industrial User IW Industrial Wastewater MCP MS4 Co-permittee NEX Stormwater No Exposure Certification OTH Other PED Petroleum Cleanup GP (8 hr) PES Petroleum Cleanup GP (<=30-day duration) PET Petroleum Cleanup GP (long term) RAF Residuals Application Facility RES Residuals/Septage Management Facility REU Reuse/Distribution System UIC Underground Injection Control Facility
STATUS A Active C Closed But Monitored N Active Permit not Required P Plugged and Abandoned (UIC) T X Active Unpermitted Discharge
NPDES Y National Pollution Discharge Elimination System N State or Local Facility
DESIGN_CAPACITY Designed capacity of facility in MGD
FEATURE Description of the point used to represent the Facility. Various values which include: Front Gate Center of Plant Other Treatment Plant Headworks
GIS_QA_METHOD NOT REVIEWED VISUAL QA WITH DOQ
USERNAME Identifier of the last user to update this record
TIME_STAMP Date the record was last updated
DATUM Code Description Spheroid Old CAC CAPE CANAVERAL CLARKE 1866 66 HARN HIGH ACCURACY REFERENCE NETWORK GRS80 80 HGPN HIGH PRECISION GPS NETWORK GRS80 90 NAD27 NORTH AMERICAN DATUM OF 1927 CLARKE 1866 27 NAD83 NORTH AMERICAN DATUM OF 1983 GRS80 83 WGS84 WORLD GEODETIC SURVEY OF 1984 WGS84 84
METHOD ADDM Address Matching AGPS Autonomous GPS DGPS Differentially Corrected GPS DMAP Digital Map Interpolation DPHO Digital Aerial Photography GGPS Geodetic Quality Global Positioning System (GPS) LORN LORAN-C Navigational Device MMAP Manual Map Interpolation MPHO Manual Aerial Photography SATI Satellite Imagery UNVR Unverified ZIPC Zip Code Centroid
SHAPE Column used by ArcSDE which does not show up as a field in ArcView
